column4: my gui keeps crashing after being in hibernate (on a laptop) when a flash video was playing in firefox. only the mouse pointer still moves. sound keeps coming in, and you can still pull up a f1-f6 terminal. is there anything i should try from the terminal? should i restart x? is that what crashed? any ideas welcomome. thankyou
the video driver in xorg, yeah.  It crashes every time you hibernate with a flash video playing?
if so, try this:  switch to vt1, and then hibernate (I can look up the command if you don't have it set to a button or whatever)
if that "fixes" it, there's a quirk option you can turn on which will tell the system to do that automatically everytime
